casebody.data:
Lewis C. Maruzo et al. v. Falls Mills Associates, Ltd. (6963)

Spallone, O’Connell and Foti, Js.

Argued March 17 decision released March 23, 1989 John C. Driscoll, with whom, on the brief, was William N. Sebastian, for the appellants (plaintiffs). F. Herbert Gruendel, with whom, on the brief, was Charles McPhedran, law student intern, for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
